author: andreas
content: B + W 52mm #502 Color Graduated Filter - Dark Grey Neutral Density (ND) Tiffen has one as well and there are cheaper from Hama. I bought it because it was in stock and I like how easy to clean B+W filters are. Much better than Hoya, and their quality is top-notch. Never had a Tiffen, so I can't comment on that.
